name: PS4 Second Screen
description:
Connect your PS4 and your mobile device with the PS4 Second Screen app to enjoy the following features:
• Use your mobile device for basic control of your PS4.
• Display information from second screen-compatible games on your mobile device.
• Enter text on your PS4 with your mobile device.
A Sony Entertainment Network account is required to use this app.
